extendedInfo.description: *Have a problem with the app starting and staying blank with Samsung Galaxy S3.Work around by turning on Developer options and checking the box for 'Disable Hardware overlays'.----[ Enjoy Learning Constellation Puzzle ]This is an educational game that allows you to learn the constellation as if you play a jigsaw puzzle. This game is designed to be simple yet fun to play. The app is best suited for people who want to learn the constellation or students who want to get ready for the exams. Or why don't you try this game to stay sharp during your spare time? You can improve your knowledge as you play the game aiming for the best time or compete against players from all over the world. You can also collect picture panels when you satisfy certain conditions. So do your best to get all of them. [Various modes can be chosen]There are three modes available: one featuring twelve constellations of the zodiac like Aries and Libra, which are also used in astrology; one featuring the the 48 Ptolemaic constellations, such as Orion and Cassiopeia, which appear in ancient myth; and one featuring the 88 constellations officially recognized by the IAU. [Assist function]When you're stuck on finding the location, use the [Assist] function. It will help you to navigate the correct location without hassling yourself. Please enjoy it.(*) Due to the nature of puzzle games, certain stars are emphasized and certain stars omitted. (*) As there are no official diagrams for the lines connecting the constellations, the forms of the constellations here may differ from those in other material.*Support tablet.

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: 5 stars if they would include a section for brief description of the constellations.
reviews.author: William Tenoever
